EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_IOTPlatformPCFandAzure_WP_Q118.Download Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading An Internet of Things Platform Powered by Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Microsoft Azure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the An Internet of Things Platform Powered by Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Microsoft Azure white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use <[[https://content.pivotal.io/iot]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
